item.title: [pi] give mod/admin.. cant get them to work
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

[quote=“deans1243, post:1, topic:370331”]so i have a givemod giveadmin and demote command but i cant get them to work can somebody tell me whats wrong with them?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cj") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deathkeep"))) { try { String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(4); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 1; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("demote") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cj") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deathkeep"))) { try { String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 0; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cj”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“deathkeep”))) {
try {
String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 3;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}

}[/code][/quote]

i’ve never done pi before, but i think that the substring is wrong on the givemod and giveadmin commands:

String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(4);

i think that the substring would be the command length + 1
so, givemod would be:

String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(8);

and giveadmin would be:

String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(10);

but, correct me if im wrong :S

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] give mod/admin.. cant get them to work
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

so i have a givemod giveadmin and demote command but i cant get them to work can somebody tell me whats wrong with them?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cj") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deathkeep"))) { try { String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(4); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 1; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("demote") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cj") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deathkeep"))) { try { String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 0; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cj”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“deathkeep”))) {
try {
String playerTodonar = playerCommand.substring(6);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerTodonar)) {
Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerRights = 3;
}
}
}
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Player Must Be Offline.”);
}

}[/code]
